segments.text: I'm observing a kitchen scene unfold before me.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The first thing that catches my eye is the sink, completely overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streams continuously from the faucet, filling the basin to the brim.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's now pouring over the front edge, creating a sheet of water down the cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A wide puddle is rapidly forming on the floor around the sink area.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman standing right in front of it seems utterly oblivious.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's calmly drying a plate, completely focused on her task.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is already immersed in the growing puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed the water soaking her shoes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression is so neutral, it's almost unsettling given the situation.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This oversight could lead to significant water damage to the floorboards.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's astounding how someone can be so absorbed in a simple chore.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope she looks down soon and sees what's happening.
segments.speaker: PAR
